data.title: Famous Canadian Film & Theater Personalities
data.meta_description: The World would have been much poorer without these famous Canadian Film & Theater Personalities!
data.text:
1

Rachel McAdams

(Canadian Actress Known for Her Films: ‘Mean Girls', 'The Notebook' and 'Spotlight')

62

18

Birthdate: November 17, 1978

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: London, Canada

Best known for her comedic and romantic film roles, Canadian actress Rachel McAdams is a very popular figure in Hollywood. Rising to fame in the 2000s, she has worked in many critically acclaimed movies. A socially responsible person, she believes in leading a lifestyle that is eco-friendly and sustainable. She is actively involved with several charities.

2

Ryan Gosling

(Famous for His Roles in the Movies 'Notebook', 'La La Land' and The Big Short')

45

12

Birthdate: November 12, 1980

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: London, Canada

Ryan Gosling began his career as a child actor and gained recognition as an adult after starring in the commercially successful film, The Notebook, in 2004. Half Nelson, The Ides of March, The Big Short, La La Land and Blade Runner are some of his other popular films. He is also a musician and his band is called Dead Man's Bones.

3

Nina Dobrev

(Canadian Actress Known for Her Role in the TV Series ‘The Vampire Diaries’)

57

18

Birthdate: January 9, 1989

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Sofia, Bulgaria

Nina Dobrev is one of the most popular Canadian actresses. Apart from her acting career, she is also known for her activism and charity work. She uses her fame to support several charitable causes, such as Puma’s Project Pink. Also an enthusiastic volunteer, Dobrev takes part in social movements like WE movement, Me to We, and We Day.

Recommended Lists:

4

Keanu Reeves

(Canadian Actor Known for His Films: 'Speed', 'Point Break' and 'The Matrix' Film Series)

466

91

Birthdate: September 2, 1964

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Beirut, Lebanon

The star of John Wick, Speed and The Matrix films, Keanu Reeves has displayed his wide range as an actor, time and again. The humble Canadian actor has also famously given away his money to recognise the work of crew and to enable the production team to hire good actors.

Recommended Lists:

5

William Shatner

(Famous for His Portrayal of Captain James T. Kirk in the 'Star Trek' Franchise)

45

10

Birthdate: March 22, 1931

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Montreal, Canada

Canadian actor, William Shatner, is best known for his roles in the television series Boston Legal, a legal drama for which he won two Emmy Awards and Star Trek, a science fiction adventure. He has also worked in many other sitcoms and films and has authored a number of science fiction novels. He is a singer and a spoken-word artist too.

6

Hayden Christensen

(Best Known for His Role of 'Anakin Skywalker/Darth Vader' in the 'Star Wars' Prequel Trilogy Films)

39

10

Birthdate: April 19, 1981

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Vancouver, Canada

Canadian actor, Hayden Christensen, is best known for his role of Darth Vader in Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones and Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith. However, many critics panned his acting in both the films. Shattered Glass, Awake, Jumper, Outcast, First Kill and The Last Man are some of his other notable films.

Recommended Lists:

7

Cobie Smulders

(Best Known for Her Role as 'Robin Scherbatsky' in 'How I Met Your Mother')

47

13

Birthdate: April 3, 1982

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Vancouver, Canada

Cobie Smulders is one of the most recognized celebrities across the world, thanks to her role as Robin Scherbatsky in one of the most popular TV series of all time - How I Met Your Mother. She also serves as an inspiration to people suffering from cancer as she was diagnosed with ovarian cancer when she was 25 years old.

8

Brendan Fraser

(Best Known for His Role as 'Rick O'Connell' in 'The Mummy' Film Trilogy)

34

8

Birthdate: December 3, 1968

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Indianapolis, Indiana, United States

Brendan Fraser is the quintessential comical action hero of Hollywood. As a result of the stunts performed by him in movies, he has had to undergo many surgeries, including a laminectomy and partial knee replacement. He is also a successful amateur photographer and serves on the board of directors for a non-profit humanitarian organization called FilmAid International.

Recommended Lists:

9

Catherine O'Hara

(Actress Known for Her Comedy Series 'Second City Television' and 'Schitt's Creek')

53

20

Birthdate: March 4, 1954

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Primetime Emmy-winning Canadian-American actor and comedian Catherine O'Hara soared to fame with the sketch-comedy show SCTV. She is known for her frequent appearances in the films of Tim Burton and Christopher Guest. She is the sister of singer Mary Margaret O'Hara and is herself a fairly decent singer.

10

Seth Rogen

(Actor and Comedian Popular for Starring in Films Like ‘Neighbors,’ and ‘Knocked Up’)

40

18

Birthdate: April 15, 1982

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Vancouver, Canada

Canadian actor Seth Rogen established himself as a bankable and popular comic actor when he starred in Hollywood films Knocked Up in 2007 and Funny People in 2009. His other notable films are Steve Jobs, The Interview, Like Father, Long Shot and An American Pickle. He is active in raising awareness about Alzheimer's disease and is an open marijuana user.

Recommended Lists:

11

Eugene Levy

(Actor and Comedian Known for His Film ‘A Mighty Wind’ and the Sitcom 'Schitt's Creek')

46

21

Birthdate: December 17, 1946

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Hamilton, Canada

Mainly known for his comic roles, Canadian actor Eugene Levy has had a career spanning over six decades, with Splash, Father of the Bride, Waiting for Guffman, American Pie and American Pie 2 being some of his memorable films. He has also acted in television and found success with the hit series, Schitt's Creek. He is also a writer and director.

12

Norm MacDonald

(Canadian Stand-Up Comedian, Writer and Cast Member on the TV Show 'Saturday Night Live')

31

6

Birthdate: October 17, 1963

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Quebec City, Quebec, Canada

Died: September 14, 2021

Norm Macdonald began by writing for Roseanne. He then soared to fame as a cast member of Saturday Night Live and became famous for his deadpan style of comedy. His other ventures include the podcast Norm Macdonald Live and the shows The Norm Show and Norm Macdonald Has a Show.

Recommended Lists:

13

Sandra Oh

(Actress)

44

15

Birthdate: July 20, 1971

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Ontario, Canada

A Canadian-American actress of Asian descent, Sandra Oh became the first Asian actress to win two Golden Globe awards and the first Asian woman to host the award ceremony. She is also the third actress of Asian origin to host the TV show, Saturday Night Live. In 2019, she was named in Time magazine's 100 most influential people in the world list.

14

Will Arnett

(Canadian Actor, Comedian and Producer Known for His Role as ‘Gob Bluth’ in the TV Series ‘Arrested Development’)

26

8

Birthdate: May 4, 1970

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Toronto, Canada

Will Arnett is widely regarded as one of the most handsome and best-looking comedians of all time; he has been named in lists like Top 15 Sexiest Nerd Boys and The 20 Hottest New Faces in Comedy. Famous for his smooth baritone voice, Will is also a popular voice actor. In 2019, he became a Canada Walk of Fame inductee.

Recommended Lists:

15

Evangeline Lilly

(Best Known for Her Role as ‘Kate Austen’ in the TV Series ‘Lost’)

25

6

Birthdate: August 3, 1979

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Fort Saskatchewan, Canada

Evangeline Lilly is a Canadian actress who has played prominent roles in films like Ant-Man and the Wasp. Also a well-known humanitarian, Lilly has made numerous trips to Rwanda, where she has touched the lives of many, as part of her charity work. She has also worked with nonprofit organizations like GO Campaign and supports Task Brasil and Sierra Club.

16

Phil Hartman

(Former Member of the Comedy Group 'The Groundlings' and 'Saturday Night Live', Co-writer of 'Pee-wee's Big Adventure')

32

6

Birthdate: September 24, 1948

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Brantford, Canada

Died: May 28, 1998

Phil Hartman was a Canadian-American actor and comedian. He is credited with helping Paul Reubens develop his famous character, Pee-wee Herman, as part of his contribution to the popular comedy group The Groundlings. After he was murdered in 1998, Hartman was honored with several awards. In 2015, Rolling Stone named him one of the greatest Saturday Night Live cast members.

17

Matthew Perry

(Best Known for His Role of 'Chandler Bing' on the TV Sitcom 'Friends')

47

12

Birthdate: August 19, 1969

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Williamstown, Massachusetts, United States

Died: October 28, 2023

Matthew Perry gained worldwide popularity for playing the character of Chandler Bing on the television sitcom Friends. The sitcom ran from 1994 to 2004 and remains one of the most popular ones till date. He also starred in other television series and a number of films. He had issued with vicodin, methadone, amphetamines and alcohol addiction.

18

James Cameron

(Canadian Filmmaker Best Known for His Films: 'The Terminator', 'Titanic' and 'Avatar')

25

8

Birthdate: August 16, 1954

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Kapuskasing, Canada

Canadian film director, producer, and screenwriter James Cameron is best known for making science fiction and epic films. He is the co-founder of the production companies Lightstorm Entertainment and Digital Domain. Time magazine named him as one of the 100 most influential people in the world in 2012. He is also an environmentalist.

19

Elisha Cuthbert

(Canadian Actress and Model Known for Role as ‘Kim Bauer’ in the TV Series ‘24’)

30

5

Birthdate: November 30, 1982

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Calgary, Alberta, Canada

Elisha Cuthbert is best known as Kim Bauer from 24, Darcie Goldberg from Old School, and Danielle from The Girl Next Door. She was a foot model at 9. Her other notable projects include the remake of House of Wax, The Ranch on Netflix, and Happy Endings on ABC.

20

Nathan Fillion

(Actor)

26

7

Birthdate: March 27, 1971

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Edmonton, Canada

Nathan Fillion is a Canadian-American actor who came into prominence after playing Malcolm Reynolds in the TV series Firefly. His popularity and style prompted public artist, Martin Firrell, to choose Fillion as his subject for two works of public art. Fillion is also credited with co-founding a non-profit organization, Kids Need to Read, along with author PJ Haarsma.

21

Christopher Plummer

(One of the Most Accomplished Actors of His Era andthe Oldest Person to Win an Academy Award)

32

9

Birthdate: December 13, 1929

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Toronto, Canada

Died: February 5, 2021

Arguably the best Canadian actor of all time, Christopher Plummer is the only Canadian and one of the few actors to achieve the Triple Crown of Acting (winning Emmy, Tony, and Academy Award). He won the Academy Award at the age of 82, becoming the oldest person to do so. Not surprisingly, he is the most respected actor in Canada.

22

Shay Mitchell

(Known for Her Role as ‘Emily Fields’ in the Thriller Drama Series ‘Pretty Little Liars’)

26

6

Birthdate: April 10, 1987

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Mississauga, Canada

Shay Mitchell is a Canadian actress, entrepreneur, model, and author. She came into prominence after portraying Emily Fields in the teen drama TV series Pretty Little Liars. Also a philanthropist, Mitchell was an ardent supporter of the Somaly Mam Foundation until the non-profit organization ended its operations in 2014. She also works closely with organizations, such as The Trevor Project.

23

Kiefer Sutherland

(Actor Best Known for His Role in the Fox Drama Series '24;)

36

9

Birthdate: December 21, 1966

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: London, England

The son of famous Canadian actors, Shirley Douglas and Donald Sutherland, Kiefer Sutherland followed in his parents' footsteps to become a famous actor. Apart from being a respected and decorated actor, Kiefer is also one of the controversy's favorite children, having been on the wrong side of the law several times.

24

Cory Monteith

(Actor and Musician Known for His Role as ‘Finn Hudson’ in the TV Series ‘Glee’)

32

7

Birthdate: May 11, 1982

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Calgary, Canada

Died: July 13, 2013

A talented young man whose life was snatched away too soon, Cory Monteith was a Canadian actor, singer, and musician who rose to fame after playing a role in the TV show ‘Glee.’ Despite being a great actor, he had a troubled life involving substance abuse and alcoholism that eventually caused his death at the age of 31.

25

Neve Campbell

(Canadian Actress who is Known for Her Work in the Drama and Horror Genres)

27

10

Birthdate: October 3, 1973

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Guelph, Canada

Neve Campbell impressed fans with her performance as Sidney in the Scream franchise. She is also known for her roles in the series Party of Five and House of Cards and the film Wild Things. A trained ballerina, Neve is mostly seen in films of the thriller or horror genre.

26

Finn Wolfhard

(Known for His Roles in the TV Series, 'Stranger Things', and the Films 'It' and Its Sequels)

78

19

Birthdate: December 23, 2002

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Vancouver, Canada

Best known as Mike Wheeler from Stranger Things, SAG Award-winner Finn Wolfhard has also appeared in It and its sequel. He was a vocalist and guitarist for the band Calpurnia and formed the indie-pop duo The Aubreys. Named to Forbes 30 under 30, he has also directed a short film.

27

Donald Sutherland

(Canadian Actor With a Film Career Spanning Six Decades)

40

9

Birthdate: July 17, 1935

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Saint John, Canada

Died: June 20, 2024

Donald Sutherland is arguably the greatest Canadian actor of all time. In an illustrious career, that spans over more than five decades, Sutherland has played an influential role in both Canadian and American entertainment industries. He won an Academy Honorary Award in 2017 for his immense contribution to cinema. He is the father of actors Kiefer, Rossif, and Angus Sutherland.

28

Michael Cera

(Actor and Musician)

28

6

Birthdate: June 7, 1988

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Brampton, Canada

Michael Cera is best known for his award-winning roles in Arrested Development, Superbad, and Juno. He has played voice roles, too. His work in theater earned him a Tony nomination. He has also toured as a bassist with an indie rock group and has released an album, True That.

29

Katheryn Winnick

(Actress)

26

10

Birthdate: December 17, 1977

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Etobicoke, Toronto, Canada

Canadian actor Katheryn Winnick is best known for her multiple award-nominated performance as Lagertha in Vikings. Fans also loved her as Hannah Burley in Bones and as Christine "C.G." Gavin in Wu Assassins. She has guest-starred in numerous projects and has also appeared in many short films.

30

Emily VanCamp

(Actress)

45

6

Birthdate: May 12, 1986

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Port Perry, Canada

Emily VanCamp is a Canadian actress best known for playing Sharon Carter / Agent 13 in superhero films like Captain America. Trained in tap dance, ballet, jazz, and hip-hop, VanCamp believes that she would have continued dancing had she not gone into acting. She also credits her training in dance with helping her through her action sequences in films.

32

Kim Cattrall

(British and Canadian Actress Known for Her Role as ‘Samantha Jones’ in the Series ‘Sex and the City’)

33

6

Birthdate: August 21, 1956

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Liverpool, England, United Kingdom

Popular as Samantha Jones from the hit series Sex and the City, Golden Globe-winning actor Kim Cattrall found it difficult to recreate the same magic on screen, barring her performance in the 2014 comedy Sensitive Skin. Her comeback with the Fox series Filthy Rich in 2020 was commendable.

34

Tommy Chong

(Known for His Role in TV Series ‘That '70s Show’ and Part of the Comedy Duo 'Cheech & Chong')

31

7

Birthdate: May 24, 1938

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Edmonton, Canada

Tommy Chong is best known for his marijuana-themed comedy albums and films of the Cheech & Chong series, in collaboration with Cheech Marin. He was seen as Leo on That '70s Show. He supports legalization of cannabis and is a NORML board member. He has faced many legal issues, too.

36

Mike Myers

(Actor, Comedian and Screenwriter Best Known for His Performance in ‘Saturday Night Live’)

38

6

Birthdate: May 25, 1963

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Scarborough, Toronto, Canada

Canadian actor Mike Myers is best known for his American Comedy Award-winning performance as Austin Powers, Dr. Evil, Fat Bastard, and Goldmember in the Austin Powers franchise. Mike, an Officer of the Order of Canada, is also known as the voice of Shrek and has directed an award-winning documentary.

37

Carrie-Anne Moss

(Actress)

26

4

Birthdate: August 21, 1967

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Burnaby

38

Sarah Chalke

(Actress and Model)

28

6

Birthdate: August 27, 1976

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Ottawa, Canada

Sarah Chalke is best known for her roles of Stella Zinman in How I Met Your Mother, Dr. Elliot Reid in Scrubs, and Becky in Roseanne. She voiced Beth Smith in Rick and Morty. After losing her grandmother and aunt to breast cancer, she started spreading awareness about the disease.

39

Taylor Kitsch

(Actor)

23

5

Birthdate: April 8, 1981

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Kelowna

Taylor Kitsch is a Canadian model and actor. Having played important roles in popular films like Battleship and X-Men Origins: Wolverine, Taylor Kitsch serves as an inspiration to many aspiring actors as he managed to establish himself despite suffering from childhood problems, such as the separation of his parents at the age of one.

40

Jennifer Tilly

(American-Canadian Actress Who is Known for Her Distinctive Voice and Comedic Timing)

24

5

Birthdate: September 16, 1958

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California, United States

Jennifer Tilly is an American actress whose performance as Tiffany Valentine in the popular horror slasher film series, Child's Play, established her as an icon within the horror film community. Also a popular poker player, Jennifer Tilly became the first celebrity to triumph in a World Series when she won the World Series of Poker bracelet.

41

Joshua Jackson

(Actor)

21

5

Birthdate: June 11, 1978

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Vancouver, Canada

Joshua Jackson is a popular Canadian-American actor who was inspired and influenced by comedian Jon Stewart during his childhood. Acting soon became his passion and he started playing prominent roles on stage, films, and TV series. Also known for his good looks, Joshua Jackson was ranked ninth in BuddyTV's list of TV's 100 Sexiest Men of 2010.

42

Dan Aykroyd

(Actor & Comedian)

31

6

Birthdate: July 1, 1952

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Ottawa, Canada

Dan Aykroyd is a Canadian comedian, actor, musician, and filmmaker. He is credited with co-founding the popular blues and soul revivalist band The Blues Brothers along with legendary comedian John Belushi. The Blues Brothers was conceived as a musical sketch for Saturday Night Live; its popularity turned it into an actual band and was later made into a film.

43

Pamela Anderson

(Actress and Model Known for Her Role in the TV Series 'Baywatch' and 'Home Improvement')

23

11

Birthdate: July 1, 1967

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Ladysmith, Canada

Actress and model, Pamela Anderson, is known as a sex symbol. She featured regularly in the Playboy magazine and acted in television series Home Improvement, Baywatch and VIP. Baywatch was hugely popular and gave her international recognition. Pamela Anderson has also acted in several films. She is an active member of People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), the animal rights organisation.

44

Tara Strong

(Voice Actor)

31

6

Birthdate: February 12, 1973

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Tara Strong has voiced countless animated characters, such as Dil Pickles in Rugrats, Bubbles in The Powerpuff Girls, and Twilight Sparkle in My Little Pony. She has also voiced for video games such as Mortal Kombat X. She now runs VoiceStarz, a company that helps people build careers in voice-acting.

45

Noah Schnapp

(Known for His Role as ‘Will Byers’ in the TV Series ‘Stranger Things’)

27

4

Birthdate: October 3, 2004

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Scarsdale, New York, United States

Noah Schnapp, best known for his SAG- and Teen Choice Award-winning performance as Will Byers in Stranger Things, began acting at age 6. He appeared in The Peanuts Movie, voicing Charlie Brown, and in Steven Spielberg's Bridge of Spies, co-starring with Tom Hanks. His dogs have their own social-media accounts.

46

Jacob Tremblay

(Child Actor)

75

18

Birthdate: October 5, 2006

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Vancouver, British Columbia

Jacob Tremblay has gained considerable fame as a child actor for his award-winning performance as Jack Newsome in the Academy Award-nominated film Room. He has also appeared in in Before I Wake, Wonder, and Good Boys. He voiced Flounder in The Little Mermaid and Blue Winslow in The Smurfs 2.

47

Missy Peregrym

(Actress, Model)

25

4

Birthdate: June 16, 1982

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Montreal, Canada

Canadian actor and former model Melissa Peregrym is best known as Andrea "Andy" McNally from Rookie Blue and as Haley Graham from the film Stick It. Fans also loved her in her Streamy Award-winning role in the web series Cybergeddon. She collaborated with TOMS to provide shoes to the underprivileged.

48

Margot Kidder

(Actress and Activist Known for Her Role as ‘Lois Lane’ in the ‘Superman Film Series’)

23

5

Birthdate: October 17, 1948

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Yellowknife, Canada

Died: May 13, 2018

Margot Kidder is best remembered for her roles as Lois Lane in the Superman movie franchise and as Kathy Lutz in The Amityville Horror. Fans also loved her in the hit Broadway play The Vagina Monologues. She was a vocal anti-war and pro-environment activist. She eventually died by suicide.

49

Simu Liu

(Known for His Portrayal in the film Shang-Chi)

21

4

Birthdate: April 19, 1989

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Harbin, China

Born in China, Simu Liu moved to Canada at 5. A business administration graduate, he took to acting after being laid off by Deloitte. Trained in martial arts, he initially found work as a stunt man. He is best known for his Canadian Screen Award-nominated role in Blood and Water.

50

Emmanuelle Chriqui

(Best Known for Her Role as ‘Sloan McQuewick’ in the TV Series ‘Entourage’)

27

5

Birthdate: December 10, 1975

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Montreal, Canada

Emmanuelle Chriqui is a Canadian model and actress. She is known for portraying important roles in films like You Don't Mess with the Zohan. Also known for her good looks, Emmanuelle Chriqui was voted the Most Desirable Women of 2010 in a poll conducted by a free online men's web portal called AskMen.
